ygData.subject: Re: enchanter only items
ygData.msgSnippet: The Glowing Stein is an enchanter only item sicne only enchanters can do the quest.  Whether it stays that way is up to enchanters hehe, Baels. ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
The Glowing Stein is an enchanter only item sicne only enchanters can do the
quest. Whether it stays that way is up to enchanters hehe,

Baels.

----- Original Message -----
From: Daniel Devorkin <devo@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, August 12, 1999 11:15
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] enchanter only items


> From: "Daniel Devorkin" <devo@...>
>
> you guys notice one thing weird about us? seem everyone has some sort of
> "class" only items except the enchanter? or perhaps i have not run into
one
> yet? I consider myself to know much about the magical items in this game
> seeing as how i have a good majority of them heh. but no enchanter only
> items? anyone run across one?
>
>
